typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,address,bytes4,bytes memory[] memory) view external returns (bool)

pollExecuted(uint256).return: true if the poll was executed.

params._code: It is the smart contract address to be called.
params._datas: It is the data option to be chosen in the poll, this data will be the msg.data of next call to be executed.
params._sig: It is the smart contract function signature, related with the function to be executed.

params.option: poll option chosen by the user.

endPoll().notice: Ends the poll with the first end date and execute the transaction chosen.

pollExecuted(uint256).notice: Verify if the poll winning option was executed.

startPoll(address,bytes4,bytes[]).notice: Start a new poll, the poll will determine which call will be done by the voting contract, only can be one poll active at once.
